title: My Night Version and other Poems
description: ‘NIGHT VERSION AND OTHER POEMS’ IS AN INTERESTING COLLECTION OF SOME FORTY POEMS WHICH OFFER REMARKABLE INSIGHTS INTO THE NATURE OF LIFE AND LIVING. THE COLLECTION IS PARTICULARLY NOTEWORTHY OF THE ORIGINAL INSIGHTS IT OFFERS INTO SUBJECTS LIKE LOVE, TIME AND DEATH, AS WELL AS NATURAL PHENOMENA LIKE THE MOON, THE SKY AND NIGHT.
author: Ebimoboere Boleigha
